name: Mariana
about: Mariana is the sweetest girl, to whom hands are reaching out to hug and stroke her. There are special cats that are so cute that you just don't want to let them out of your arms. Mariana is just one of those). This cute little face, these big and expressive eyes, this constantly changing expression-from curiosity to surprise-all this gives the baby even more charm and charm. The girl is 7 months old, STERILIZED, initially vaccinated, healthy. She is accustomed to the tray and the scratching post. Mariana is a small playful, contact girl who will turn into a graceful, effective and wise cat as she grows up. And Mariana wants to pass every stage of her life right next to you, in mutual love and trust!

name: Michelle
about: Michelle is a charmer with a white collar and the same sugar-white and pure soul! How can you not fall in love with this beauty, when her tenderness pours over the edge, when Michelle's cheerful and playful mood fills any room with enthusiasm, positivity and energy!.. Mishelka gets along well with other cats, you can go to the kids. The kitten is 3 months old, vaccinated, healthy. That, in fact, is all! You just have to take the baby into your home, and, believe me, a cloud of happiness and optimism will descend into your arms with her!

name: Marvin
about: Do you like the sophistication of dark chocolate? And the milkiness and airiness of white marshmallows! Our hero of the post-the cat Marvin color like a marshmallow in chocolate combined all the charm and attractiveness of these two contrasting colors. A graceful, plastic and stately handsome man is unlikely to leave you indifferent. He is active, playful, affectionate and contact. She loves children very much. Marvin the kitten is 1.5 years old, neutered, vaccinated, accustomed to the tray and scratching post. This cute boy is really looking forward to his new home and hopes that the warm hands of a kind owner will warm his heart! Let's make his little dream come true!
